entry.title: Is God to Blame for Coronavirus? | Live Church

media:group.media:title: Is God to Blame for Coronavirus? | Live Church
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with John Dinzey. Was the Coronavirus a preventable pestilence? Throughout the Bible we see examples of how God has dealt with those who have disregarded His law and how health can be affected by that choice. What does following God's law have anything to do with health? Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Pastor John Dinzey.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 10: The Bible as History

media:group.media:title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 10: The Bible as History
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 2, lesson 10 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "How To Interpret Scripture" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “The Bible as History”. Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
This week's lesson is for May 30 to June 5, 2020.
Reading: 1 Samuel 17, Isa. 36:1–3, Isa. 37:14–38, Daniel 1, Daniel 5, Matt. 26:57–67, Heb. 11:1–40.
Memory Text: “I am the Lord your God, who brought you out of the land of Egypt” (Exod. 20:2 [also Deut. 5:6], NKJV).
Sunday (John Lomacang) - "David, Solomon, and the Monarchy" Monday (Kenny Shelton) - “Isaiah, Hezekiah, and Sennacherib” Tuesday (Danny Shelton) - “Daniel, Nebuchadnezzar, and Babylon” Wednesday (Jill Morikone) - “The Historical Jesus” Thursday (Ryan Day) - “Faith and History”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/assets/public/files/lessons/2020/2Q/SE/PDFs/EAQ220_10.pdf

entry.title: Weapon of Warfare | Help is Coming (Live Church)

media:group.media:title: Weapon of Warfare | Help is Coming (Live Church)
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with Kenny Shelton. Just suppose Jesus came today. Would you be ready to meet Him? Which side are you on? Are you fighting for God or against Him. It can only be one or the other. The Bible is clear, there is no middle ground. Christians have fought spiritual battles since sin entered this world. Do you have a weapon to fight in this spiritual war? All of Heaven is fighting to save as many people as possible.The Bible says an angel of the Lord is around those who love and obey Him. The choice is yours. Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Pastor Kenny Shelton.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 9: Creation: Genesis as Foundation—Part 2

media:group.media:title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 9: Creation: Genesis as Foundation—Part 2
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 2, lesson 9 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "How To Interpret Scripture" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled "Creation: Genesis as Foundation—Part 2". Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
This week's lesson is for May 23 to May 29, 2020.
Reading: Job 26:7-10; Genesis 1; Genesis 2; Genesis 5; Genesis 11. 1 Chron. 1:18-27; Matt. 19:4-5; John 1:1-3
Memory Text: “The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament shows His handiwork” (Psalm 19:1, NKJV).
Sunday (Ryan Day) - “A Flat Earth?” Monday (Jill Morikone) - “Creation in Ancient Literature” Tuesday (John Lomacang) - “Genesis Versus Paganism” Wednesday (John Dinzey) - “Creation and Time” Thursday (Kenny Shelton) - “Creation in Scripture”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/assets/public/files/lessons/2020/2Q/SE/PDFs/EAQ220_09.pdf
